1 hour training in one of the following specialisms:

  • circuit boards,
  • working with acrylic,
  • working with wood,
  • engraving.

The induction will cover: clamping, types of cutters, materials, homing and touching off, overview of CAD process, safety, reporting.

running costs for the router are £5 per hour into the honesty box. This covers future maintenance.

cost: £30 (members only).

Contact matt at mattvenn dot net or nic_marshall at outlook dot com for booking a session!

This induction is necessary before using the cnc_mill.
